required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effects of Western Diet Patterns on Plasma Inflammatory and Cardio Metabolic Health Signatures in Middle-aged Adults
clinical_study.official_title: The Effects of Western Diet Patterns on Plasma Inflammatory and Cardio Metabolic Health Signatures in Middle-aged Adults

brief_summary.textblock:
The Western diet pattern or standard American diet is a modern dietary pattern that is characterized by high intakes of meat, pre-packaged foods, fried foods, high-fat dairy products, eggs, refined grains etc. When considering the role of saturated fat, it may be prudent to advise limiting all foods that contain saturated fats, including traditional foods such as unprocessed/minimally processed meat, eggs, whole dairy in addition to processed, pre-packaged foods; however, this reductionist approach fails to take into account the food matrix and overall diet in which these nutrients are consumed.
Traditional whole food sources such as beef, poultry, dairy, and eggs have increasingly been replaced by processed, pre-packaged versions in the Western diet pattern. Epidemiological evidence suggests that increased modern, pre-packaged food consumption is a major risk factor for metabolic disease by promoting inflammation. Based on these data, the investigators hypothesize that the pro-atherogenic effect of the Western diet is caused by the pro-inflammatory effects of consuming large amounts of modern pre-packaged foods, and that consumption of a similar amount of total and saturated fat from minimally processed beef, poultry, dairy and eggs will positively impact inflammatory markers and lipoprotein profiles of study participants.

primary_outcome.description: Plasma interleukin-6 levels will be measured before and after each diet

primary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma c-reactive protein levels
primary_outcome.description: Plasma c-reactive protein levels levels will be measured before and after each diet
Plasma acylcarnitines profiles levels will be measured before and after each diet

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by the doubly labeled water method during the last week of each diet

arm_group.description: Multi-ingredient, ultra-processed formulations of the traditional diet.

intervention.description: Consuming an traditional whole foods based diet for 4 weeks.
Consuming an processed formulation of the traditional diet for 4 weeks.
